dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 13, 2005 6:13 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: marsgerm.com@gmail.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] copyright violation
Date: Mon, 13 Jun 2005 09:46:42 -0500
From: Peter Lu <marsgerm.com@gmail.com>
Reply-To: Peter Lu <marsgerm.com@gmail.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Dear SIr:
~ It came to my attention that at least one of our articles was used by
p2preactor.com <http://p2preactor.com> without our authoriztion. I found
that the website is hosted in your server. I'd request you delete the
hosting account for the website due to the nature of the business the
website is doing.
~ The violation is not just a single event. I found that all the content on
p2preactor.com <http://p2preactor.com> is copied from other news sites in
verbatim.
~ I suggest that you delete the web site immediately to avoid your
involvement into any legal trouble.
~ Thank you for your attention.
~ Regards,
~  John Roberts
foodconsumer.org <http://foodconsumer.org>


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCrhMTvK/XpJs6oyURAu8jAJ9cP7sjNoW+uhhyCGn1d5Sn+K0nmwCgn7hL
bC5czOyjPx7G9hJPOUQHWOY=
=n3Y6
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
